Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have bounced back with two convincing performances with the ball.
Bangladesh have also won two out of their four matches.
Although they lost their previous game against India, the likes of Litton Das and Taskin Ahmed impressed for the Bangla Tigers.
All in all, another entertaining game beckons at the Adelaide Oval with two valuable points up for grabs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 41st match of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022 will see Bangladesh (BAN) take on Pakistan (PAK) at the Adelaide Oval in Adelaide on Sunday, November 6.
Adelaide Oval has been a relatively high-scoring venue with the average first-innings total being 164.
Both pacers and spinners have enjoyed the conditions on offer, accounting for more than 10 wickets across four matches at the venue.
Batting first has been the preferred choice with the record also skewed heavily in their favor.
